Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1910 EAST IDAHO STREET,SUITE 102-BOX 604, ELKO, Nevada, 89801, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: U.S. Gold Corp is a U.S. focused gold exploration and development company. It has a portfolio of exploration properties. The CK Gold Project is located in Southeast Wyoming and Maggie Creek are exploration properties on the Cortez and Carlin Trends in Nevada. The Challis Gold Project is located in Idaho.
